body: It says つづく To be continued so there should be a continuation
This is hilarious.  He'll find out later down the road. Then the fun really begins....it's fiction but I'm sure it really happens out there all the time

My guess is, she was probably starting to like the other guy and he always liked her.
But the guy knew that he was just a replacement.
The girl too, I think she had sex with him one last time as a closure, to leave whatever feelings she might have had.
The only winner here is the girl.
She got the guy she wanted, passed time while playing with other one.
This isn't an NTR story, both the guys are miserable. One will never have his love, other was betrayed by his two friends and probably will never be told about it.
The correct decision should have been to reject the confession as she should have realised that it was her weak heart that resulted in her having a relationship with other dude without telling her crush her feelings.
Or simply tell the guy about your current relationship, he will find out one day. Then all will go down to shit.
Poor lads.
Coming from a broken family, normies can never understand why ntr hurts soo much
@SakuraNoHana4 even the darkest cosmic horrors are not as fucked up as simple betrayal
pain.
Can we call this NTR or cheating? It is more of her having a sex friend until she found the one to be with

Considering how ambiguous the term netorare seems to be, well, you could say this is netorare in a way. The other guy took her away from him in a way, in a physical way to be precise. Her perception of love is already "tainted" by this experience. I wonder if this story was headed towards the same direction as "my heart's for my boyfriend, my body's for my teacher". The guy also seemed to be agonizing over the though of having her been already stolen from him (or just being rejected?)

   
I also wonder if this is the way hentai artists mock the male lead archetype in romance and harem shonen manga, because the indecisive male character waiting for the "right" moment to confess gets defeated, in an extent, by an assertive character.
So far this is the second third or fourth one where the previous sexual encounter was ambiguous to whether or not it really happened
XD wtf why people find ntr so "horrifying" it's just cheating? I mean there's things like rape, bestiality, tentacles, incest but yall freak out w ntr??? LOL
the drawing was ok.

This made me give up hentai and masterbation. Fuck this shit and fuck Hajimete no... (another of the artists works). Not only did this and the other story disgust me so much that I stopped jerking off I'm more fucking religious now. Do you understand how fucked up this is? Fuck this shit, fuck jerking off, im giving it up and fuck this type of shit. Fucking horny kids, fuckin casual sex. Peace yall fuck this shit, religion 100%
eh it's good but not good enough to bookmark, unless there's part 2
Wait how do you guys know that part 2 is canceled? Is it actually canceled? Goddammit, I don't want a cliffhanger.
the girl's a playa,the only winner here.Technically aint cheating but can be argued as such.Not ntr though

I fucking hate this feeling because it sort of true. Before you got with your gf, spouse, or partner they were fucking other people. Someone you may have known so... Like how do you feel fine thinking the one you love has gone around enjoying depravity? Rwgardless of gender doesn't the feeling suck? Glad part 2 was canceled because the story is perfect ending here as it is.
If part 2 is really cancelled imma be annoyed
When I saw that the part 2 was canceled I thought, "Well, I'll just read it and not get too invested," but then the author ends it with that fucking cliffhanger. God, I'm so fucking pissed.
so on the last page it said part 2 is coming on new magazine february 2019
any idea if part 2 exists? comic18 doesnt have it

not netorare. Dick move by friends behind his back but also respectfully stopped when he finally maned up and confessed. She gonna have to use the dildo lie when she don't bleed though and her friend knows she shouldn't have been with any guys lol
From the girl's perspective this is hot - banging one friend and dating the other, but from the boy's perspective this is quite triggering. I guess author is a girl.
Mmmm, I don't know about that chief, I think she belongs to the streets.
I mean, why would she date the main guy if she likes to have sex with the other guy? What makes me mad its not NTR, its the twisted logic in this kind of hentai
There is no cheating involved...lol
There are many factors the cause of cheating. It's not cheating if her heart belongs to him. In this case seems like they're just sex friends.
Poor bastard never had a real friend.... They kept a lie from him. Well sucks to be him.
dunno but this isn't NTR or cheating  after all the were just childhood friends, but well ok was so boring and sex scenes  normal as fuck didn't even gave me a boner so hmm not recommended
Aww, I wish he’d come over for advice instead
how is this cheating?
